name: Validate reply message when user is invalid

testSteps.description: Example: {lat=50, lng=60, username=, message=invalid user, value=10}

children.description:
Given the time zone service is consumed with the data
| 50 | 60 |  |
Analyst consume serivice get time zone
analyst executes a GET on the resource /timezoneJSON?formatted=true&lat=50&lng=60&username=
GET http://api.geonames.org/timezoneJSON?formatted=true&lat=50&lng=60&username=
